root: ^The day goes on as Hyde continue on his journey.
^The echo from his footsteps resonate with the clinking mechanical sounds-chirping from one building to another.
^The ticking clock feels like it's mocking Hyde from the time he had spent here.
^The footsteps that's been following Hyde finally come to a stop upon seeing a familiar figure up ahead.
^The presence of this man, stoic yet filled with promising wisdom, struck a string of memories in the researcher's head.
